title: Represent Client in Correspondence Audit
description: A client is being audited by mail regarding their charitable contribution deductions.

tasks.description: Gather all donation receipts and acknowledgment letters from the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all supporting documentation for the claimed donations.

tasks.description: Draft a response letter to the IRS auditor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a professional letter explaining the deductions.

tasks.description: Mail the response letter and copies of the supporting documents to the IRS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the complete response package to the auditor.
